thread.title: Ronald Piddington
thread.title_full: Rapid Formations reviewed by Ronald Piddington

author: Ronald Piddington
title: Ronald Piddington
text:
I wish these guys had been around 12 years ago when I started my first limited company - what a hassle I had then!
This service really is fantastic. It's easy to use, completely professional and gives you an accurate timescale of how Companies House will process the details.
